explains: n. 发展，前进；一系列；（从一音或和弦进至另一音或和弦的）进行；占卜术
wordGroup: arithmetic progression 等差级数，等差数列；算术级数，算术数列
geometric progression 几何级数；等比级数

sentences.en: Inhibitor drugs have been developed to block two of the proteins, to slow progression of the disease after infection.
sentences.cn: 已经开发出抑制药物来阻断其中两种蛋白质，以减缓感染后疾病的进展。

sentences.en: The progression of the disease can be retarded by early surgery.
sentences.cn: 早期手术可以抑制病情的发展。

sentences.en: Both drugs slow the progression of HIV, but neither cures the disease.
sentences.cn: 两种药都能减缓艾滋病病毒的发展，但都不能治愈艾滋病。
